entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
